creditline: Gift of John E. Andrus III
description: hexagonal cluster of circles with circular and linear patterns and various colors; three circles punched out of paper; yellow and brown spackle effect  behind circles
inscription: Signature, title, date, edition and chop
markings: chop on back, bottom center in black: [HP (inside a square)]
medium: Etching with cutting, watercolor and copper, silver and gold leaf
signed: below image, in pencil: [7/18 North Nielsen 02]
title: North, from "Cardinal Suite"
